faq1.question: What are TikTok Notes?
faq1.answer: TikTok Notes is a new lifestyle app launched by TikTok  to share photos of travel tips, daily recipes, educational content and more.

faq2.question: Why download TikTok Notes photos?
faq2.answer: As TikTok Notes is new, its photo content can be original and cutting-edge. Downloading Tiktok Notes photos provides visual resources to support both work and study.

faq3.question: Is it free to download TikTok Notes images?
faq3.answer: Yes, it is free to download images from TikTok Notes with TikNotes.App.

faq4.question: Is it safe to download TikTok Notes images?
faq4.answer: Yes, TikNotes.App is totally safe to use. No login and registration is required.

faq5.question: Can I use TikNotes.App on PC?

answer.subtitle: Yes. While TikTok Notes itself is only available on mobile devices, you can still use TikNotes.App on your computer to download images by following these steps:
lists: Copy the TikTok video link on your mobile device.
Send this link to yourself (e.g., via email or messaging app).
Open TikNotes.App in your PC's web browser.
Copy and paste the TikTok video link into TikNotes.App on your PC.
Use TikNotes.App to download the photo content.

faq6.question: What image format does TikNotes.App support?
faq6.answer: TikNotes.App supports downloading photos in JPEG format. We consider offering more format options in the near future.

faq7.question: Can I download TikTok Notes photos in bulk?

answer.subtitle: No, bulk downloading of TikTok Notes photos is not possible. The process works as follows:
lists: Paste one link at a time into TikNotes.App
All photos from a single post will load on the screen
You must download each photo individually.

faq8.question: Can I reuse images downloaded from TikTok Notes?
faq8.answer: Reusing images with permission can violate the copyright holder. We recommend asking the creator before you repurpose any image from TikTok Notes.
